steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the picture you want to flip.
Go to the 'Format' tab in the Word ribbon.
In the 'Arrange' group, click on the 'Rotate' button.
Select 'Flip Horizontal' or 'Flip Vertical' from the drop-down menu, depending on your desired flip direction.
The picture will be flipped accordingly.
